forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by some light rain this afternoon. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.
